ControlUI.SegmentationManager module#

class ControlUI.SegmentationManager.SinogramVtk(parent=None)[source]#

Bases: QObject

static numpy_array_as_vtk_image_data(source_numpy_array)[source]#
Parameters:

source_numpy_array – source array with 2-3 dimensions. If used, the third dimension represents the channel count.

Note: Channels are flipped, i.e. source is assumed to be BGR instead of RGB (which works if you’re using cv2.imread function to read three-channel images) Note: Assumes array value at [0,0] represents the upper-left pixel. :type source_numpy_array: np.ndarray :return: vtk-compatible image, if conversion is successful. Raises exception otherwise :rtype vtk.vtkImageData
